r_ele.r: むねのつかえがおりる

sense.gloss: to be relieved of a worry, to get a load off one's chest
to feel blocked (of one's chest or throat, due to grief, anxiety, illness, etc.), to feel pressure, to feel pain

words.gloss: to be relieved of a worry, to get a load off one's chest
